snippet: A prison inmate who was trying to contain a Southern California wildfire died early today when he fell off a cliff.    The convict, who was not identified, was among about 50 prisoners put to work fighting the 2,000-acre brush fire. He was using a...
lead_paragraph: A prison inmate who was trying to contain a Southern California wildfire died early today when he fell off a cliff. The convict, who was not identified, was among about 50 prisoners put to work fighting the 2,000-acre brush fire. He was using a chainsaw before dawn when he went over the 150-foot drop, said Rose Regalado, a spokeswoman for the Ventura County Fire Department.
abstract: Prison inmate serving with firefighting detail trying to contain Southern California wildfire dies after falling from cliff (S)

headline.main: California Prisoner Dies Fighting a Fire
